_comment: Configuration file for Halloween Image Generator
_instructions: Choose 'stability', 'openai', 'huggingface' (FREE), 'replicate', or 'pollinations' (100% FREE, NO TOKEN!) for api_choice

api_keys.stability_ai: Get your API key from https://platform.stability.ai/
api_keys.openai: Get your API key from https://platform.openai.com/
api_keys.huggingface: Get FREE token from https://huggingface.co/settings/tokens (optional but recommended)

pricing.huggingface: FREE (with rate limits) - RECOMMENDED FOR FREE USAGE

estimated_cost.100_images_huggingface: FREE (may take longer due to rate limits)

recommendations.free: Use 'huggingface' - completely free with rate limits
